TopicTitle: Tour of the Minas Anor: starting parts mission for 5528 science.

Articles.Content:
Direct album link http://imgur.com/a/aG6ej#0

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Crazy mission And awesome. How much time it took in RL? Because fiddling with those gravity assists and slingshots had to take time.

It did indeed. I flew it over the course of a week.

Most of the time was spent trying to navigate the Joolian system. I quit in frustration several times trying to avoid Tylo's influence.

The first and last third are relatively straightforward and don't take much time.

HOW?!

Seriously.

I have a video of my previous launch with a slightly smaller ship. It's very long, but I provide commentary to describe what I'm doing.

The Minas Anor craft file (ie, the one used in the album mission) is linked from the video description on youtube.
Sir, that was a splendid feat of engineering, navigation, execution, and patience. Each category should get separate rep but sadly I can only give you 1.
